trends: There have been 6 other sightings in Dalton
There were no other sightings in Dalton on or around September 29th 2013
Summary: UFO object seen over tree line
divs: sighting detailsi was walking my dog at the dalton sand pits, when i witnessed an object over the tree ling just to my south\east. looked like a hovering star "amber" at first. i pointed my camcorder at object and recorded... it slowly picked up speed, but was still very slow... object continued on a heading of 290 and its altitude was under 2000 ft in my opinion.. and went directly over me.. i put the camera down and looked with my binoculars... object was very strange... it had several appendages that were in the shape of a x with a center structure. four strobing lights, and center appendage looked like a multi-solar panel... the whole occurance took about 4 minutes... the object flew to the west\north\wst over the mountains and out of site... i stopped recording before that though... was too hard to see well by then, and my arms could not do it any longer... i have not downloaded my video yet.... i will need to send it to you later... just let me know....
